title: Default Credentials
description:
You find a web-based management interface at http://192.168.1.1. The login page says 'Linksys Router Admin Panel'.

Many network devices ship with factory default credentials that administrators forget to change.

What is the classic default username:password combination for older Linksys routers?

Submit as: flag{username:password}
hints: Many consumer routers use very simple default credentials
The username and password are often the same word
It's the most obvious admin credential you can think of
